access_token.description: An access token for your GitLab server. Instructions on how to generate an access token here.

base_url.description: URL for your self hosted GitLab server. Leave empty for GitLab SaaS. Not all tables are supported for GitLab SaaS.

concurrency.description: A best effort maximum number of Go routines to use. Lower this number to reduce memory usage.
